cd thirteen
! golang list -deps
stderr 	'(Go version in golang.mod is 1.13, so vendor directory was not used.)'

cd ../unspecified
! golang list -deps
stderr 	'(Go version in golang.mod is unspecified, so vendor directory was not used.)'

-- thirteen/foo.golang --
package foo

import _ "github.com/foo/bar"
-- thirteen/golang.mod --
module example.com

golang 1.13
-- thirteen/vendor/github.com/foo/bar/bar.golang --
package bar
-- unspecified/foo.golang --
package foo

import _ "github.com/foo/bar"
-- unspecified/golang.mod --
module example.com
-- unspecified/vendor/github.com/foo/bar/bar.golang --
package bar
